channel.title: How to make others admin on server

item.title: How to make others admin on server
item.dc:creator: @udluv2 udluv2
item.description:
@udluv2 wrote:

On testscape u go into your client.java and search for admin list or something along those lines and then add their name to the list next to the rights level u want them to have.

In other sources like pimpscape u open the characters folder select the character u want to give rights and it dshould say players rights:0 change the 0 to

3 - owner rights
2 - Admin rights
1 - P mod rights

Read full topic
item.source: How to make others admin on server

item.title: How to make others admin on server
item.dc:creator: @jules1313 jules1313
item.description:
@jules1313 wrote:

Go search in your client folder to the admin list (ctrl+F) might be usefull just type in admin. then about the 3 should be a list with a few files : NAMEHERE , just change their name to who you wanna be a mod/admin and change the code off what u want them to be , 1= moderator 2= admin 3 = owner

hope i helped you.

Read full topic
